turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, what can I do for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, could you with putting in a pizza order at Bella Luna?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I sure can! Not a problem.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of pizza would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: So for the first one, I would like it to have just plain cheese.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The second one, I would like to have like a garden pizza or a veggie lover's pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For the third, I would like sausage and onions on it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And for the fourth, I would like green peppers, mushrooms, and onions.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me read it all back to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can you also tell me what size you'd like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure. Can you make the pizzas medium?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And I would also like thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: most definitely, medium thin crust pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: one cheese pizza, one veggie lovers pizza, one sausage & onion pizza, and one with green peppers, mushrooms and onion.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let me get that order sent to Bella Luna for you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're order's total also would be $75.53.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order has been sent to Bella Luna and is being prepared. Your order should be ready for pickup soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Thank you so much for your help. I appreciate it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I hope you enjoy your meal!
